tool_description: A comprehensive API providing data on top anime rankings, popular series, and trending shows from multiple sources including MyAnimeList (MAL) and AniList.
name: AniHub
title: AniHub

api_list.name: Get all upcoming animes from ANILIST
api_list.description: Get all upcoming animes from ANILIST
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anihub.p.rapidapi.com/upcomingAnimeAniList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anihub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
